tags: you know who I am talking about
where do I get myself a guy
summary: Where do I get myself a guy who'd be like: I am barely coping with my own shit, but let it be known that I am always here for...
body: Where do I get myself a guy who'd be like: I am barely coping with my own shit, but let it be known that I am always here for you at any time of day and night ready to listen to all of your problems and offer any possible support even if I'll have to reach you through space and time just for you to feel that you're not alone and maybe we're cry a little bit in the process.

dialogue.name: Where do I get myself a guy who'd be like
dialogue.label: Where do I get myself a guy who'd be like:
dialogue.phrase: I am barely coping with my own shit, but let it be known that I am always here for you at any time of day and night ready to listen to all of your problems and offer any possible support even if I'll have to reach you through space and time just for you to feel that you're not alone and maybe we're cry a little bit in the process.

title: Halfway through sign-ups
body:
Sign ups close on 9/29 at 11:59AM PDT for this year’s Star Wars Rare Pairs Exchange! We’re close to meeting last year’s sign up numbers, so if you’re interested, definitely come check it out.

Countdown: https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/launch?iso=20180929T115959&p0=137&font=cursive

Sign up: https://archiveofourown.org/collections/swrarepairs2018/signups/new

Tagset: https://archiveofourown.org/tag_sets/2580

blog.name: crazyintheeast
blog.title: Crazy in the East
blog.description:
My current interests are :Sara Lance, Runaways(especially Karolina and Nico), Supergirl, Lena Luthor(no toxic fans are tolerated here), Pitch Perfect, The Gifted

Things I cover in general :
Jaimie Alexander(Kyle XY forever), Natalie Dormer, Person of Interest, Legends of Tommorow Wheel of Time,Happy ,Endings,Parks and Recreation,Community,Continuum
 Lost Girl, Doctor Who(especially pre Moffat),     Game  of Thrones,Buffy,Disney,Marvel, Korra, Arrow, Elementary , Once Upon a Time .Stargate , Firefly, Warehouse 13 and so on. Plus random weird and pretty stuff. 
Just a warning I post a lot and I am likely to flood your dash with stuff
.Also things I especially like are tagged "awesome". Things I find especially useful or that I would like to use or buy some day are "lifehacks".

I am bored often so feel to ask me whatever you want whenever you want. Also I do gifs sometimes. You can check them under the tag "my gifs"

summary: General Leia Organa: Thank you Rey. Your help was invaluable but I am afraid that there is no fast solution here. We will need...
body:
General Leia Organa: Thank you Rey. Your help was invaluable but I am afraid that there is no fast solution here. We will need years just to get financing for the rebellion
Rey: Oh no worries. Here I got you all the money you need. More then enough to buy a fleet
General Leia Organa: By the Force how did you get so many credits?
Rey: Easy. I scanned Master Luke's books. They immediately became number one bestseller on the GalaxyNet. People REALLLY want to know how to use the Force
General Leia Organa: You....sold the sacred texts of the Jedi Order to thousands of people?!?
Rey: Actually from the last numbers we have sold over one hundred and fifty billion copies around the galaxy

blog.name: myblacknightworld
blog.title: It's funny, y'know
blog.description: Camilla, italian, Capricorn, bookworm, fangirl, love bad puns, love writing and drawing. But above all... still bad puns. I do have a deviantArt, so if you want to check that out, I'm called "Sanni14". Also, recently I've hopped back in the Star Wars fandom, especially the prequels one (bc Obi-Wan) and the Rebels one. And I remembered why I loved Rebels so much (read Kanan and Kanera and feels). SO, expect Star Wars things from me!

blog.name: goddessofroyalty
blog.title: Goddess of mpreg, kink & bittersweet
blog.description: I sit atop a throne of omegaverse, mpreg, and kink. My inbox (+ Submissions + PMs) is always open for conversation (including revivals/continuations of old ones) & Prompts. AO3: GoddessofRoyalty. Header by Ren-Hime.

tags: Q and A with the Goddess
summary: I feel like Obi-Wan would have a very strange relationship with his duck. On one end he strangles it yet on the other end when...
question: I feel like Obi-Wan would have a very strange relationship with his duck. On one end he strangles it yet on the other end when he's stumped he tells it all about his problem. Duck Maul is in a very odd position and the day Darth Maul learns of it is a very, very odd day indeed.
answer:
Honestly at first Maul is probably thinking that he’s going to learn like military tactics and other important information that he can later use against Obi Wan. All he has to deal with is a bit of light strangulation in between - totally easy and the reward is more than worth it. 

Instead he gets complaints about Obi Wan’s adult-Padawan as well as Jedi gossip. Like he doesn’t find out anything about the new ships the Jedi are getting but he does learn how Anakin didn’t listen when Obi Wan said he shouldn’t try and cut a fruit with his lightsaber and had it explode on him and who is stealing whos shampoo.

reblog.comment:

Instead he gets complaints about Obi Wan’s adult-Padawan as well as Jedi gossip. Like he doesn’t find out anything about the new ships the Jedi are getting but he does learn how Anakin didn’t listen when Obi Wan said he shouldn’t try and cut a fruit with his lightsaber and had it explode on him and who is stealing whos shampoo.

Instead he gets complaints about Obi Wan’s adult-Padawan as well as Jedi gossip. Like he doesn’t find out anything about the new ships the Jedi are getting but he does learn how Anakin didn’t listen when Obi Wan said he shouldn’t try and cut a fruit with his lightsaber and had it explode on him and who is stealing whos shampoo.

Honestly at first Maul is probably thinking that he’s going to learn like military tactics and other important information that he can later use against Obi Wan. All he has to deal with is a bit of light strangulation in between - totally easy and the reward is more than worth it. 

Instead he gets complaints about Obi Wan’s adult-Padawan as well as Jedi gossip. Like he doesn’t find out anything about the new ships the Jedi are getting but he does learn how Anakin didn’t listen when Obi Wan said he shouldn’t try and cut a fruit with his lightsaber and had it explode on him and who is stealing whos shampoo.

blog.title: Posts from Redrikki-land
blog.description: Rambling and fic about Star Wars, The 100, Avatar, and whatever fandom strikes my fancy

question: Character meme: Ahsoka Tano?
answer:
• First impression - Ugh, a sidekick. Really?
  • Impression now - Great addition to the Star Wars universe, but Dave’s obsession with her and her survival at the expense of all other considerations is a bit much.
  • Favorite moment - Not sure. Her confrontation with Vader in Rebels was pretty cool, but there are just so many great moments with her in Clone Wars.
  • Idea for a story - I am always up for time travel, especially since she literally does it in Rebels.
  • Unpopular opinion - She should have died confronting Vader in Rebels. Her survival undermined what they were trying to say about her relationship with Anakin and makes her look bad for not getting back involved with the rebellion.
  • Favorite relationship - Snips and Skyguy all the way.
  • Favorite headcanon - Bisexual who fails hard too processing her emotions to actually do anything about it until long after her teens. Half of her angst in the Onderon arc was because she was into both Lux and Steela and ended up jealous of both of them.

  • Idea for a story - I am always up for time travel, especially since she literally does it in Rebels.
  • Unpopular opinion - She should have died confronting Vader in Rebels. Her survival undermined what they were trying to say about her relationship with Anakin and makes her look bad for not getting back involved with the rebellion.
  • Favorite relationship - Snips and Skyguy all the way.
  • Favorite headcanon - Bisexual who fails hard too processing her emotions to actually do anything about it until long after her teens. Half of her angst in the Onderon arc was because she was into both Lux and Steela and ended up jealous of both of them.

  • Favorite moment - Not sure. Her confrontation with Vader in Rebels was pretty cool, but there are just so many great moments with her in Clone Wars.
  • Idea for a story - I am always up for time travel, especially since she literally does it in Rebels.
  • Unpopular opinion - She should have died confronting Vader in Rebels. Her survival undermined what they were trying to say about her relationship with Anakin and makes her look bad for not getting back involved with the rebellion.
  • Favorite relationship - Snips and Skyguy all the way.
  • Favorite headcanon - Bisexual who fails hard too processing her emotions to actually do anything about it until long after her teens. Half of her angst in the Onderon arc was because she was into both Lux and Steela and ended up jealous of both of them.

tags: Star Wars Adventures Tales From Vader&039;s Castle
summary:
Star Wars Adventures: Tales from Vaders Castle #1 (IDW)

				
			
				
			

 Cavan Scott (A) Derek Charm (A/CA) Chris Fenoglio ...
body:
Star Wars Adventures: Tales from Vaders Castle #1 (IDW)

Cavan Scott (A) Derek Charm (A/CA) Chris Fenoglio                                            Cavan Scott (A) Derek Charm, Chris Fenoglio (CA) Francesco Francavilla

Tales from Vader’s Castle puts a spooky spin on your favorite characters from a galaxy far, far away…

This exciting weekly series explores the hidden corners of the Star Wars universe and features Rebels stars Hera, Kanan, and Chopper; Obi-Wan Kenobi and Count Dooku; Han Solo and Chewbacca; the Ewoks; and of course, Darth Vader -all under the shadow of Vader’s Castle!

Fans will be excited to discover these creepy stories by fan-favorite writer Cavan Scott with art by the greatest talent from across the galaxy, including Derek Charm, Kelley Jones, Chris Fenoglio, Corin Howell, Robert Hack, and Charles Paul Wilson III!

Covers by Eisner-winning artist Francesco Francavilla! Collect all five!
Featuring your favorite Star Wars characters in classic spooky stories!
Ask your retailer about the ultra-rare variant cover by Derek Charm!

$3.99/each

Star Wars #55 (Marvel)

Kieron Gillen (A) Salvador Larroca (CA) David Marquez

“HOPE DIES” PART 6
•  If anyone is to survive this disaster, sacrifice is needed…
•  Who’s going to make it?
•  If hope dies, what survives?
Rated T

$3.99

Comic Releases for October 3, 2018 Star Wars Adventures: Tales from Vaders Castle #1 (IDW) Cavan Scott (A) Derek Charm (A/CA) Chris Fenoglio                                            Cavan Scott (A) Derek Charm, Chris Fenoglio (CA) Francesco Francavilla…

tags: star wars secrets of the empire
summary: ILMxLAB Teases Darth Vader Announcement Today
title: ILMxLAB Teases Darth Vader Announcement Today
body:
It’s been a while since we’ve heard anything about ILMxLAB’s Darth Vader VR project.  That doesn’t mean that the company has been doing nothing in the meantime.  They’ve released the successful ‘Star Wars: Secrets of the Empire’ VR experience in various locations.  Now the company is teasing a Darth Vader announcement for today, September 26th.  Now I wonder what that could be all about?

Alert all commands. pic.twitter.com/ZJc4yEUb4W

— ILMxLAB (@ILMxLAB) September 25, 2018

tags: Q and A with the Goddess
summary: So this is goofy but comes from your post on the rubber duck theory. Anakin walks in on Obi-Wan strangling a rubber duck and...
question: So this is goofy but comes from your post on the rubber duck theory. Anakin walks in on Obi-Wan strangling a rubber duck and they just stare at each other until Obi-Wan finally just goes 'Anakin, meet Maul the duck. Duck Maul, meet Anakin.'
answer:
Okay so I don’t know what’s funnier - if the rubber duck is in fact Maul who in one of his weird “that didn’t kill me” things ended up as a rubber duck OR if it’s a rubber duck Obi Wan brought, possibly for it’s likeness to the Sith, and then named Duck Maul.

Either way I feel like Anakin doesn’t want to touch the situation but also wants to know everything bout it. And he’s totally telling Ahsoka as soon as he sees her next. Also probably Rex.

So like all the Clones know by the end of the day. And Obi Wan sticks by his decisions that got him into that situation.
